meta.query: #全红婵不参加全运会单人项目#

response.query: #全红婵不参加全运会单人项目#
response.msg:
嗯，用户想了解全红婵不参加全运会单人项目的情况。这个问题有较强的时效性，需要重点参考最新信息。

首先看时间线：今天（2025年11月1日）有多个媒体报道最新赛程调整。结果1、8、17、18等显示官网已更新名单，全红婵确实未出现在女子单人10米台参赛名单中，广东队由蒋林静和谢佩铃出战该单项。这与10月中旬的报名信息（结果2、34、35等报道将参加三项）形成明显变化。

关于原因，结果7、9、19等提到伤病恢复考量。结果7明确表示"伤愈没多久，比不了这么多场"，且单人项目赛程密集（预赛/半决赛/决赛），团队出于保护目的调整。这与结果26提到的"距腓前韧带损伤伴关节腔积液"病史吻合。

参赛安排方面，结果1、12、18等详细列出：她将参加11月2日女子团体双人10米台（搭档王伟莹），以及11月6日女子双人10米台（同样搭档王伟莹）。结果43补充说明这是她时隔183天重返赛场。

外界反应呈现两极：结果23、27等表达遗憾，结果20质疑"噱头营销"；但更多声音如结果15、22强调"健康完赛更重要"。结果28、44则呼吁公众降低期待值。

值得注意的矛盾点：结果28在11月1日仍称"将参加三项"，但根据更权威的结果8（央视体育）、17（大湾区之声）等媒体账号信息，此内容应属滞后报道。结果3虽然曾在10月25日质疑"不参赛"传言，但已被最新官网信息证伪。

最后补充背景：结果39、45提到她近期通过VR训练、针灸理疗等方式恢复，207C动作成功率回升；结果31显示陈芋汐将参加单人项目，竞争格局变化。

综上，核心事实明确：基于伤病管理策略，全红婵确已退出单人项目，专注双人赛事。回答将按"参赛调整-原因分析-新赛程-公众反应"四个维度组织，用加粗强调关键时间点和项目名称，并在开头直接给出结论性提示。


关于全红婵不参加第十五届全运会（大湾区全运会）女子单人10米跳台项目的情况，综合官方信息和各方解读，核心事实及背景如下：
### 一、参赛计划调整确认
1. **最新官方名单**
根据11月1日更新的十五运会官网信息，广东队参加女子单人10米跳台预赛（11月8日）的选手为蒋林静和谢佩铃，全红婵未出现在该项目的报名名单中。她的参赛项目仅保留：```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 3, "data": {"num": [1, 8, 17, 18, 21, 24, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视体育", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228229407279437", "index": 8, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "网易体育频道", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228220179809307", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "大湾区之声", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228237288642514", "index": 17, "label": ""}, {"name": "粤TV精选", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228236918493547", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "逐浪新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228236163253557", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "粤TV精选", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228235161338026", "index": 24, "label": ""}, {"name": "粤TV", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228234406894137", "index": 25, "label": ""}], "name": "央视体育", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/b2664ecdly8gdi6oss5r8j20go0gomxb.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762003385&ssig=%2FVS6EUW%2Fdg", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228229407279437", "vType": 3}}```
- **11月2日**：女子团体双人10米跳台（搭档王伟莹）
- **11月6日**：女子双人10米跳台（搭档王伟莹）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [1, 12, 18, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "粤TV精选", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228236918493547", "index": 18, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "网易体育频道", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228220179809307", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "国球人生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228218628183618", "index": 12, "label": ""}, {"name": "科技阿浪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228233941061336", "index": 26, "label": ""}], "name": "粤TV精选", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/0080qLpLly8i36nshfiqbj30go0go0t2.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762003385&ssig=qKkWRCndYG", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228236918493547", "vType": 3}}```

2. **与此前计划的差异**
10月中旬公布的初版报名名单显示，全红婵原定参加女子团体、女子双人及女子单人10米跳台三个项目。此次调整属赛前最终变更。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [2, 34, 35, 37], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "大皖新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5222670744685141", "index": 34, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "北青体育", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5222458019022224", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "北京日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5223595347544977", "index": 35, "label": ""}, {"name": "封面新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5222655784913260", "index": 37, "label": ""}], "name": "大皖新闻", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1023.1023.50/001Uy0Wgly8hbemb0m53cj60sg0sfmy202.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762003385&ssig=eQbxQcxs64", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5222670744685141", "vType": 3}}```
网易体育频道
国球人生
大皖新闻

### 二、调整原因分析
1. **伤病恢复与体能管理**
全红婵自2025年5月因**距腓前韧带损伤伴关节腔积液**退出全国跳水冠军赛后，连续缺席世锦赛等赛事。尽管近期训练状态回升（如重现“水花消失术”），但广东队选择减少其参赛强度，避免密集赛程（单人项目需经历预赛、半决赛、决赛）带来的身体负担。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [7, 9, 19, 26, 36, 39, 44, 45], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "银子堆成山", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5223701440364732", "index": 36, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "国球人生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228223111627806", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "国球人生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228233299597528", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "岚风漓雪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228236714018327", "index": 19, "label": ""}, {"name": "科技阿浪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228233941061336", "index": 26, "label": ""}, {"name": "音潮狗狗派", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227502290600912", "index": 39, "label": ""}, {"name": "夜微凉50104", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227559031673282", "index": 44, "label": ""}, {"name": "岭南沐阳", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227522896954182", "index": 45, "label": ""}], "name": "银子堆成山", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.540.540.50/007wlBNAly8hrfebc2s3sj30f00f0ta2.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762003385&ssig=3ZT4JJJZxY", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5223701440364732", "vType": 0}}```

2. **团队策略考量**
广东省跳水队整体实力强劲，在女子单人项目上派出蒋林静、谢佩铃两名选手，足以保障竞争力。此举可让全红婵专注于双人项目夺金任务，同时降低其复出压力。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 10, "data": {"num": [7, 12, 18, 19], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "国球人生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228223111627806", "index": 7, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "国球人生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228218628183618", "index": 12, "label": ""}, {"name": "粤TV精选", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228236918493547", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "岚风漓雪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228236714018327", "index": 19, "label": ""}], "name": "国球人生", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/006ehHTSly8gxz64icyxoj30go0go75c.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762003385&ssig=Wvc12ugc7r", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228223111627806", "vType": 0}}```
音潮狗狗派
夜微凉50104

### 三、参赛意义与公众反应
1. **复出标志性意义**
本次全运会是全红婵**时隔183天**重返正式赛场（上一赛为2025年5月3日世界杯总决赛）。即使未参加单人项目，其亮相仍受高度关注，相关赛事门票“1分钟内售罄”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [1, 11, 43], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "网易体育频道", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228220179809307", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "体界风云", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228128714883650", "index": 11, "label": ""}, {"name": "玉哥的日常", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228192904253149", "index": 43, "label": ""}], "name": "网易体育频道", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/a45a7f57ly8hj8vgpv7vwj20go0godhb.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762003385&ssig=ZUMfIU5%2FU7", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228220179809307", "vType": 3}}```

2. **舆论两极反应**
- **理解与支持**：多数观点认为保护运动员健康优先，期待其稳步恢复。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [15, 19, 22, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "大爱红色蓝色胖猫", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228237693387179", "index": 15, "label": ""}, {"name": "岚风漓雪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228236714018327", "index": 19, "label": ""}, {"name": "铲屎官Isaro", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228235269867133", "index": 22, "label": ""}, {"name": "黑龙江卫视", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228226416742425", "index": 28, "label": ""}]}}```
- **遗憾与质疑**：部分观众因无法看到其与陈芋汐的“巅峰对决”表示失望，亦有声音质疑前期宣传“用全红婵造势”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [20, 23, 27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "想吃啥吃啥嗯哼", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228236377430501", "index": 20, "label": ""}, {"name": "桃子湖悠悠", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228235211408899", "index": 23, "label": ""}, {"name": "用户7249701374", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228232955399111", "index": 27, "label": ""}]}}```
### 四、补充背景
- **陈芋汐成单人项目焦点**：作为全红婵长期对手，陈芋汐确认出战女子单人10米台，并直言“目标冲击冠军”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [30, 31, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "吉视守望都市", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227567305983150", "index": 30, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "无敌盈姐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227549846405969", "index": 31, "label": ""}, {"name": "广西日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227504844411664", "index": 32, "label": ""}], "name": "吉视守望都市", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.720.720.50/00729pCnly8h8vgi5rd0lj30k00k0wgb.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762003385&ssig=di0X37cbuV", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227567305983150", "vType": 3}}```
- **全红婵未来目标**：知情人士透露，其长期目标仍为2028年洛杉矶奥运会，本次调整属阶段性策略。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [40, 45], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "直新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5223582998466480", "index": 40, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "岭南沐阳", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227522896954182", "index": 45, "label": ""}], "name": "直新闻", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006N4ALSly8gdi6ut01v6j30u00u00tw.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762003385&ssig=rpNfl46VAd", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5223582998466480", "vType": 3}}```
直新闻

### 总结
全红婵退出全运会单人项目是团队基于**伤病恢复进度**和**科学备赛规划**作出的决策，旨在保障其长期职业生涯。她仍将通过双人项目展现竞技状态，为后续大赛积累信心。
